author: Jon Costantino
title: John Rich: Everybody “Stay Home!”
description: On FOX Across America with Jimmy Failla, country music superstar John Rich talks about his new song, which was influenced by President Trump and the Coronavirus Task Force's recommendation for everyone to "stay home." "I heard the President say, just stay hom…
content:
On FOX Across America with Jimmy Failla, country music superstar John Rich talks about his new song, which was influenced by President Trump and the Coronavirus Task Force's recommendation for everyone to "stay home."
